fields.name: 11+ English Workbook
fields.description: Ideal for preparation in the run-up to the 11+ English test and other selective entrance exams, this book contains a huge range of questions at the level of the final tests. The book is divided into three sections. The first section focuses on training the child to have the correct mindset to help them gain confidence. The second section delves into the detail of each topic and provides examples as well as many questions to test their understanding. The third section consists of realistic assessment tests to improve their speed and accuracy across a wide range of questions. The detailed answers are included as pull-outs to this product.

fields.name: A4 Grid Notebook
fields.description: This notebook provides 80 sheets of 80gsm A4 paper. Pages contain 5mm square perfect for mathematical equations, graphs, charts and scientific equations. Have a better experience drawing graphs with the faint aided lines for cleanliness and better clarity in drawing and viewing trends.

fields.name: Document Holders (5-Pack)
fields.description: This multi-coloured 5-pack is not only aesthetically appealing with its minimalistic design but also functions even better. It protects your documents from any sudden spills or if carried in the rain. Stay on top of your organisation (and for the visual learners: your colour-coordination) game with these products!

fields.name: A4 Clipboard
fields.description: Do you do any site work or attend countless meetings or extra classes and need to carry and contain documents together in a professional manner? If so, this the product for you! The leather covering allows it to be waterproof in the event of rain or snow and incase any liquid is spilled over. As long as your clipboard remains closed, this product protects your documents with a professional aesthetic.

fields.name: StudyHaven Maths Geometry Set
fields.description: A full maths set with a 180° protractor, two set squares, a 15cm ruler, two compasses, a 9cm pencil, a pencil sharpener, an eraser and a 10mm stencil. Guaranteed to be of use to your maths and science studies.

fields.name: HB Pencil Set (12-Pack)
fields.description: The best quality pencils to allow you to draw and write pages for your studies before it requires resharpening. The handwriting also rub out easily with an eraser.

fields.name: Highlighter Set (4-Pack)
fields.description: Orange, pink, green and yellow pens in a wallet. Their wedge tips useful to draw broad lines, highlights and underlines. Distinctive flat barrel design to stop the pen from rolling away. Anti-Dry-Out 4 hour cap off time. Sold and priced per pack of 4 pens

fields.name: Black Pen Set (32-Pack)
fields.description: Perfect spherical medium tip (1.0mm), fine quality (0.4mm line width) black biro pens. No smudging and smooth writing. Quick drying and very resistant if in contact with liquid - simply pat dry and scribble on a scrap sheet of paper if necessary then continue your note-taking.

fields.name: A4 Plastic Wallet Sleeves
fields.description: 300 x A4 clear plastic wallets, hole punched to also make it suitable for putting in folders. These wallet sleeves are well fitted and resistant to easy tear.

fields.name: A4 Ruled Notebook
fields.description: Standard A4 ruled refill notebook/pad for general note-taking. Contains 160 pages, 70 GSM, feint line paper.

fields.name: A4 Plastic Folders (4-Pack)
fields.description: Can contain up to 150 sheets of A4 paper. Its press stud closure feature helps keep contents secure. Waterproof due to the durable polypropylene. Transparency provides easy viewing of contents.

fields.name: A4 Level Arch Files
fields.description: A great solution for when your notes, files, documents or papers need more room than an ordinary A4 folder. Made from recycled material and is also recyclable upon disposal. Organised and modern appearance given with its colour and structure. Add section dividers to make this a solid filing system for any or your study notes, homework or coursework. Measurements are 315 x 288 x 70mm.

fields.name: A4 Weekly Planner
fields.description: Our StudyHaven weekly planner is perfect: a calendar for your appointments, homework or deadlines and a notebook for your ideas, thoughts and to-do lists. It combines our favourite everyday items – in an effective and efficient way to offer maximum potential with more structure.

fields.name: A4 Plain Notebook
fields.description: Perfect refill pad for any student as this product gives customers the opportuntity to express themselves and be creative with their note-taking. Despite StudyHaven specialising in STEM subjects, this product is very versatile in other subjects and hobbies due to its minimalism.
